On your turn, its better than [Spined Wurm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spined Wurm)

posts.post_content: I'm fairly certain a 5/5 for 4G *without* any drawbacks wouldn't have been too overpowered--especially since in the previous set [Hollowhenge Beast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hollowhenge Beast), a 5/5 for 3GG, was printed and saw little play outside of Limited. I just see no reason whatsoever to give this card such a harsh drawback.
